data: `minecraft:behavior.knockback_roar` allows an entity to emit a roar effect that knocks back other entities in a set radius from where the roar was emitted.
`minecraft:behavior.knockback_roar` requires a Trigger Event in order to work properly.

data.Name: attack_time
data.Description: The delay after which the knockback occurs (in seconds).

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time (in seconds) the mob has to wait before using the goal again.

data.Name: damage_filters
data.Description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to apply damage to.

data.Name: duration
data.Description: The max duration of the roar (in seconds).

data.Name: knockback_damage
data.Description: The damage dealt by the knockback roar.

data.Name: knockback_filters
data.Description: The list of conditions another entity must meet to be a valid target to apply knockback to.

data.Name: knockback_height_cap
data.Description: The maximum height for vertical knockback.

data.Name: knockback_horizontal_strength
data.Description: The strength of the horizontal knockback.

data.Name: knockback_range
data.Description: The radius (in blocks) of the knockback effect.

data.Name: knockback_vertical_strength
data.Description: The strength of the vertical knockback.

data.Name: on_roar_end
data.Description: Event that is triggered when the roar ends.
